definition: former hatred/bygone enmity
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to dislike/suspicion/resentment/enmity/abbr. for 嫌犯[xian2 fan4], criminal suspect
to forget former enmity (idiom)
to forget previous differences/to bury the hatchet

sentences.english: The way to be happy is to let go, and reach out.
sentences.chinese: 快乐的途径是不计前嫌，主动和好。

sentences.english: All right. Let's bury the hatchet and be friends.
sentences.chinese: 好了，让我们捐弃前嫌，成为朋友。

sentences.english: Let's wipe the slate clean and forget our past quarrels.
sentences.chinese: 让我们捐弃前嫌，忘却过去的争吵吧。

sentences.english: Let's put all these behind us.
That pace has just gotten even slower, highlighting the difficulty the two countries continue to face in putting a nasty past behind them.
sentences.chinese: 进展如今甚至更加缓慢，凸显两国捐弃前嫌的困难。

sentences.english: We've waited six months for him to remedy the breach.
sentences.chinese: 六个月以来我们一直等待他们能够冰释前嫌。

sentences.english: These two used to be business opponents, but they have buried all their old grudges and are sitting together right now.
sentences.chinese: 这两个生意上曾经的对手，如今捐弃前嫌坐在了一起。

sentences.english: He hoped, despite the evidence, that they had forgiven him.
sentences.chinese: 他还希望的是他们能够不计前嫌宽恕他的过错。

sentences.english: It is time to bury our past misunderstandings.
sentences.chinese: 是我们捐弃前嫌的时候了。

sentences.english: They soon forgot their differences and were friends again.
sentences.chinese: 他们不久就摒弃前嫌而重归于好。

sentences.english: Let's bury the hatchet and be friends.
sentences.chinese: 好了，让我们捐弃前嫌，成为朋友。

sentences.english: The two boys agreed to let bygones be bygones and make friend again.
sentences.chinese: 两个孩子决定捐弃前嫌，重新做朋友。

sentences.english: My advice is that it's best to forgive and forget.
sentences.chinese: 我的意见是最好不记前嫌。

sentences.english: It also allows us to forgive and forget, bury the hatchet, and roll with the punches.
sentences.chinese: 健忘让我们宽恕和遗忘，捐弃前嫌，大事化小。

sentences.english: Xie Shuang not plan past grudge, in receiving its the home, take care of.
sentences.chinese: 叶霜不计前嫌，将其接入家中照顾。

sentences.english: QuXiao gauze also abandon past, and wins the hug.
sentences.chinese: 曲筱绡也一弃前嫌，与胜美拥抱。

definition: to forget former enmity (idiom)
to convert an enemy into a friend (idiom)
old grievance/former complaint
magnanimous (idiom); generous
to become reconciled/to bury the hatchet
to forget previous differences/to bury the hatchet
to dispel (enmity, misunderstandings etc)/to vanish (of misgivings, differences of opinion)/thaw (in relations)
feelings of gratitude and loyalty
to write off at one stroke
to make friends again/to renew old cordial relations
an obstruction/barrier/ill-feeling/grudge
to forget and not bear recriminations (idiom); to let bygones be bygones/There is no point in crying over spilt milk.
mutual affection/friendship
magnanimous (idiom)/generous
old friend/former acquaintance
lit. to exchange weapons of war for gifts of jade and silk (idiom)/fig. to turn hostility into friendship
pinyin: hua4 gan1 ge1 wei2 yu4 bo2
